Projectile Motion & Vector.docstring:
Calculates the total time of flight for a projectile on a level surface.

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    launch_angle_degrees (float): The launch angle (θ) with respect to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The total time of flight (T) in seconds (s).

Calculates the horizontal range (R) for a projectile on a level surface.

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    launch_angle_degrees (float): The launch angle (θ) with respect to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The horizontal range (R) in meters (m).

Calculates the maximum height (H) reached by a projectile on a level surface.

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    launch_angle_degrees (float): The launch angle (θ) with respect to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The maximum height (H) in meters (m).

Calculates the vertical position (y) of a projectile given its horizontal position (x) (Trajectory Equation).

Parameters:
    x_position (float): The horizontal distance (x) from the launch point in meters (m).
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    launch_angle_degrees (float): The launch angle (θ) with respect to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The vertical position (y) in meters (m).

Calculates the vertical position (y) of a projectile given its horizontal position (x) and total range (R) (Trajectory Equation).

Parameters:
    x_position (float): The horizontal distance (x) from the launch point in meters (m).
    horizontal_range (float): The total horizontal range (R) in meters (m).
    launch_angle_degrees (float): The launch angle (θ) with respect to the horizontal in degrees.

Returns:
    float: The vertical position (y) in meters (m).

Calculates the range of a projectile launched up an inclined plane.

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    projection_angle_alpha_degrees (float): The projection angle (α) relative to the incline in degrees.
    incline_angle_beta_degrees (float): The angle of the incline (β) relative to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The range (R) along the incline in meters (m).

Calculates the time of flight for a projectile launched on an inclined plane (either up or down).

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    projection_angle_alpha_degrees (float): The projection angle (α) relative to the incline in degrees.
    incline_angle_beta_degrees (float): The angle of the incline (β) relative to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The total time of flight (T) in seconds (s).

Calculates the projection angle (α) relative to the incline that gives the maximum range up the incline.

Parameters:
    incline_angle_beta_degrees (float): The angle of the incline (β) relative to the horizontal in degrees.

Returns:
    float: The projection angle (α) for maximum range in degrees.

Calculates the maximum possible range of a projectile launched up an inclined plane.

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    incline_angle_beta_degrees (float): The angle of the incline (β) relative to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The maximum range (R_max) along the incline in meters (m).

Calculates the range of a projectile launched down an inclined plane.

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    projection_angle_alpha_degrees (float): The projection angle (α) relative to the incline in degrees.
    incline_angle_beta_degrees (float): The angle of the incline (β) relative to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The range (R) along the incline in meters (m).

Calculates the projection angle (α) relative to the incline that gives the maximum range down the incline.

Parameters:
    incline_angle_beta_degrees (float): The angle of the incline (β) relative to the horizontal in degrees.

Returns:
    float: The projection angle (α) for maximum range in degrees.

Calculates the maximum possible range of a projectile launched down an inclined plane.

Parameters:
    initial_speed (float): The initial launch speed (u) in m/s.
    incline_angle_beta_degrees (float): The angle of the incline (β) relative to the horizontal in degrees.
    gravity (float, optional): The acceleration due to gravity (g) in m/s^2. Defaults to 9.81.

Returns:
    float: The maximum range (R_max) along the incline in meters (m).
